_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualities of a mendicant who knows the m: Can explain the meaning of statements
Qualities of a mendicant who has self-kn: Knows the extent of their faith
Knows the extent of their ethics
Knows the extent of their learning
Knows the extent of their generosity
Knows the extent of their wisdom
Knows the extent of their eloquence
Qualities of a mendicant who knows moder: Knows moderation when receiving medicines and supplies for the sick
Qualities of a mendicant who knows assem: Knows how to approach different types of assemblies
Knows how to stand, act, sit, speak, or stay silent in different types of assemblies
Qualities of a mendicant who knows peopl: Understands people in terms of pairs
Can distinguish between praiseworthy and reprehensible qualities in people
